AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the leader of a banned faction that is trying to overthrow the tyrant from the throne of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} faction.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cashier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] serves customers in the grocery chain of the urbanized world.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Secretary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is responsible for reviewing and filtering complaints and documents before sending them to management.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Clergyman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the spiritual leader of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} village during the years of isolation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Monk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has lived {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life in an isolated fortress serving a religious cult.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Battle monk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has lived all {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life in the fortress, having managed to take part in its defense.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Paratrooper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in the amphibious assault group for landing from orbit.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Historian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] explores the rich history of the human race and its intricate experiences.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fortress commandant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] oversees the defense of the fortress and instructs the militia.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Serf
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] работает на своего хозяина, является лично обязанным.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Boyarin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is of noble origin, using its privileges.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Remote identity
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] doesn't remember anything about {PAWN_gender ? his : her} past. In fact, only a shell remained of him.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exiled leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] The head of an exiled government with no real political power.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exiled soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] A member of the exiled volunteer army hoping to restore legitimate authority.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bomber
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a dangerous criminal and a failed suicide bomber. During the terrorist attack, {PAWN_gender ? his : her} explosive device did not work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Deserter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] surrenders to a hostile military group and gives them strategic intelligence.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shadow agent
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] An undercover rebel agent who collects information and transmits it to the underground.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Secret gendarme
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] a seemingly unremarkable citizen who, however, is engaged in the search and neutralization of saboteurs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Spaceship engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] Builds and designs spaceships for multiple crew members.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bloody executioner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an executioner in a medieval world that has lost its last moral foundations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Peacemaker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] Soldier in the Interfactional Army Peacekeeping Corps. The balance between them collapses, and their army remains on its own.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Coordinator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] coordinates resistance and intimidation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Agitator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] secretly distributes leaflets and slogans of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} political group to overthrow the regime.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Theorist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] explores quantum physics and builds models of the universe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Marauder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: He trades in robbery and robbery. One day [PAWN_nameDef] is caught by a counterintelligence agent.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fanatic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is fanatically loyal to {PAWN_gender ? his : her} spiritual leader through acts of retaliation and intimidation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Nuclear scientist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] researches radioactive decay of atoms and designs nuclear power plants.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Victim
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In {PAWN_gender ? his : her} youth, [PAWN_nameDef] becomes the victim of a terrorist attack, which forever changed {PAWN_gender ? his : her} psyche.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Political prisoner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was held in harsh camps for political prisoners for a long time, having developed immunity to moral turmoil and acquired survival skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Navigator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] - the captain of a spaceship whose mission was to explore the nearest space.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Minister
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has held a high political office, successfully doing {PAWN_gender ? his : her} job.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Stormtrooper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] A member of the Assault Team of the Battle Force. Long years in the ranks have left their mark on the psyche.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Test pilot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] tested new flight and aeronautical facilities until one day it crashed on unknown land.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kamikaze
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] desperate suicide pilot who was tasked with eliminating the enemy by air ramming. In fulfilling {PAWN_gender ? his : her} duty, {PAWN_gender ? he : she} miraculously remains alive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Plate warrior
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] a soldier of the medieval army, dressed in sturdy full-body armor.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rebel leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] The leader of an anarchist group that aims to eliminate the rightful leader of the faction.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chairman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is in charge of a projectile industrial facility. Years in the profession led to the fact that {PAWN_gender ? he : she} studies the basics of military affairs.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Serial killer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] A ruthless psychopath who murdered {PAWN_gender ? his : her} family in cold blood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Maniac
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a serial killer with an unpredictable disposition and thoughts.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Destroyer of planets
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] becomes a spaceship pilot carrying dangerous weapons capable of destroying an entire planet. Once {PAWN_gender ? he : she} applies it on the orders of the commander.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Editor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] edits and censors scientific journal articles.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dancer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has dedicated {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life to dance and theater.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Dance teacher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: FFF

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Notary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] authenticated documents in a small office in an urbanized world.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Publisher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] publishes magazines and newspapers with a small print shop.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: School doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] works in a school in the industrialized world, however, {PAWN_gender ? he : she} is usually difficult to find in {PAWN_gender ? his : her} workplace.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Captive soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured early in the war after being in a POW camp for several years.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Captive doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was captured early in the war after being in a POW camp for several years working as a POW medic.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Volunteer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] went to the front as a volunteer motivated by moral imperative.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Combat chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] prepares food for the mobile army at the front.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Combat doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] provides first aid to soldiers on the battlefield.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Zoologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] studies animal behavior and physiology.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Guitar player
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] plays guitar with a traveling music group.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Field sapper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] Expert in building crossings and bridges for a marching army.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Minesweeper engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] disables mines and minefields for the army to pass.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Art critic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is well versed in art, criticizing and researching.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Undergrounder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] terrorist group agent underground.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Underground leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] leader of an underground terrorist organization.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Scientist traitor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] fled to the enemy, taking with {PAWN_gender ? him : her} the secret development blueprints.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Debtor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been working for a creditor most of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life, repaying an exorbitant debt.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exorcist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] performs rituals of cleansing and banishing evil spirits in the medieval world.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Professor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a broad knowledge of technical sciences while teaching at the university.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: University rector
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] manages the university's operations, finances and curriculum.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Impostor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] described himself as a miraculously escaped monarch in an attempt to seize power.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ship pilot
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to fly small spaceships.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Charlatan
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] cheats money from people using dirty methods.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Jester
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] a clown in the medieval world, living at the court of the monarch.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Heretic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] renounced the official religious faith, condemning himself to persecution.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Preacher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] distributed forbidden religious literature under persecution.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Influence agent
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a privy councilor, effectively controlling the puppet king with the knowledge of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} faction.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pimp
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has several slaves selling their sexual favors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Jailer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] works in the underground prison complex, keeping an eye on prisoners.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Plumber
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] repairs water supply and sanitation systems.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Military academician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] designs military blueprints for the military academy researchers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Primitiver
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: FFF

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chastener
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is engaged in the most brutal cleansing of the occupied cities from the rebels.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Military chemist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] creates chemical weapons for global warfare.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Loner pirate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] robs small caravans passing by while staying in the shadows.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pawn
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a simple performer, a pawn in the hands of a skilled manipulator.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Manipulator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] An unprincipled person who sets {PAWN_gender ? his : her} own goals at the head.
